attributes.action: save the creed street arts theatre
attributes.additional_details: The creed street art theatre in wolverton holds dance classes,drama classes tae kwondo classes and much more. It is highly valuable to the community and the last perfomance was highly praised and yet it is being replaced by another buszy which will not only affect the people who go to the creed street arts theatre but it will also have a high influence of alcoholism on the surrounding area. By signing this petition you are helping us prevent this.
